mapper.select: SELECT gm.id, gm.parent_id as parentId, gm.menu_href as menuHref, gm.menu_name as menuName, gm.sort, gm.type FROM ai_menu gm LEFT JOIN ai_role_menu_relation grmr ON gm.id = grmr.menu_id WHERE grmr.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT gm.id, gm.parent_id as parentId, gp.menu_name as parentName, gm.menu_href as menuHref, gm.menu_name as menuName, gm.sort, gm.type, gm.create_user, gm.create_time FROM ai_menu AS gm left join ai_menu gp on gm.parent_id = gp.id where gm.id = #{id}

SELECT gm.id, gm.parent_id as parentId, gp.menu_name as parentName, gm.menu_href as menuHref, gm.menu_name as menuName, gm.sort, gm.type, gm.create_user, gm.create_time FROM ai_menu AS gm left join ai_menu gp on gm.parent_id = gp.id
